name: SeekChat
description: Provides a desktop AI assistant capable of executing tasks on your computer.

name: Tester Client
description: Facilitates testing of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers by providing a chat-like UI.

name: Simple Slackbot
description: Empower Slack with AI by integrating Large Language Models and external tools through the Model Context Protocol.

name: Console Chat GPT
description: Enables command-line interaction with various AI models, including OpenAI, MistralAI, and others.

name: Y-Cli
description: Enables terminal-based AI conversations with support for multiple AI models and MCP client integration.

name: Mcp Chatbot
description: Demonstrates integrating the Model Context Protocol (MCP) into a CLI chatbot.

name: Copilot MCP Client
description: Connects VSCode's Copilot Chat to MCP servers, enabling access to tools and resources.

name: FLUJO
description: Orchestrates AI models, Model-Context-Protocol (MCP) servers, and complex workflows through a unified interface.

name: Mcp Client Cli
description: Enables interaction with LLMs and MCP-compatible servers from the command line.

name: HyperChat
description: Enables users to chat using various LLM APIs and productivity tools through the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

name: Witsy
description: Provides a desktop AI assistant that supports various LLM providers and offers features like prompt anywhere, AI commands, and document chatting.

name: Chatmcp
description: Interact with AI models using the Model Context Protocol through a cross-platform chat client.

name: Oterm
description: Interact with Ollama models directly from your terminal using a straightforward text-based client.

name: 5ire
description: A cross-platform AI assistant and Model Context Protocol (MCP) client that connects to various services and local knowledge bases.

name: Goose
description: Automates complex development tasks using an extensible, open-source AI agent.

name: LibreChat
description: Self-host a privacy-first, versatile ChatGPT alternative supporting multiple AI models and advanced features.

name: Cherry Studio
description: Enables users to interact with multiple large language model (LLM) providers through a single desktop client.

name: Cline
description: Automates coding tasks directly within your IDE using AI, capable of creating/editing files, executing commands, and using the browser with user permission.

name: Zed
description: Edit code with high performance and multiplayer collaboration.
